original_text: “‘Cursed be anyone who lies with his sister, whether the daughter of his father or the daughter of his mother.’ And all the people shall say, ‘Amen.’
korean_text: 그의 자매 곧 그의 아버지의 딸이나 어머니의 딸과 동침하는 자는 저주를 받을 것이라 할 것이요 모든 백성은 아멘 할지니라

sentences.original_text: ‘Cursed be anyone who lies with his sister,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 누이와 동침하는 자는 저주를 받을지니라

sentences.original_text: whether the daughter of his father
or the daughter of his mother.’
And all the people shall say,
